metadata.title: CVE-2021-21859 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable integer truncation vulnerability exists within the MPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Content library v1.0.1. The stri_box_read function is used when processing atoms using the 'stri' FOURCC code. An attacker can convince a user to open a video to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
